channel.title: [REQ] Small request, should only take a few mintues
channel.description:
Alright, I'm setting up a survey for a school project, and I need 8 pictures total.
So, I need:
[ul] [*] 1 picture of a women's face ( Just the face ). [*] With this picture, I need you to create a copy, but cut one side off, and mirror the remaining side to replace the cut-out side.
[*] 1 picture of a man's face ( Just the face ). [*] Again, I need a copy of this picture, but with one side of the face being a mirror image of the other.[/ul]
So, there should be 2 face pictures ( 2 female, 2 male ) and 2 copies of those pictures, which would be mirrored.
I hope this made sense, and I'd really appreciate these soon, like, today. :P
-Weibs.
EDIT: I know only need 4 pictures, check above.
